TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlWorkflowInstanceStore extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStore
Public NotInheritable Class SqlWorkflowInstanceStore Inherits InstanceStore

summary.span: 從持續性功能的抽象 類別衍生，並提供實作以允許將執行個體狀態資訊儲存至 SQL Server 2005 或 SQL Server 2008 資料庫，以及從 SQL Server 2005 或 SQL Server 2008 資料庫載入執行個體狀態資訊。

span.span: Derives from the abstract class of the persistence functionality and provides implementation to allow saving instance state information to and loading instance state information from an SQL Server 2005 or SQL Server 2008 database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用 來序列化複雜型別，而要使用此執行個體存放區來保存之工作流程中所使用的所有型別必須使用 來序列化。 uses the to serialize complex types; all types used in workflows to be persisted with this instance store must be serializable using . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 。The following code sample demonstrates creating a . 這個範例取自[持續性參與者](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md)範例。This example is from the [Persistence Participants](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/persistence-participants.md) sample.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan HostLockRenewalPeriod { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.HostLockRenewalPeriod : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 指定主機可針對工作流程服務執行個體上更新其鎖定的時間週期。

span.span: Specifies the time period within which the host renews its lock on a workflow service instance.
The time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果主機沒有在這個時間週期內更新鎖定 (換句話說，延長租用期)，持續性提供者會解除鎖定執行個體，而其他主機就可以鎖定執行個體。If the host does not renew the lock (in other words, extend the lease) with this in this time period, the persistence provider unlocks the instance and another host may lock the instance. 值是"hh: mm:"的表單。The value is a of the form "hh:mm:ss". 允許最小值是"00: 00:01"（1 秒）。The minimum permitted value is "00:00:01" (1 sec). 這個屬性的預設值是"00: 00:30"（30 秒為單位）。The default value of this property is "00:00:30" (30 seconds). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 HostLockRenewalPeriod。The following code sample demonstrates using HostLockRenewalPeriod in a . 這個範例取自[內建組態](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md)範例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceCompletionAction InstanceCompletionAction { System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceCompletionAction get(); void set(System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceCompletionAction value); };

summary.span: 指定工作流程執行個體完成後要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies the action to be taken after a workflow instance completes.

summary.span: 可能的值為 "DeleteNothing" 和 "DeleteAll"。

span.span: Possible values are "DeleteNothing" and "DeleteAll".

summary.span: 預設值為 "DeleteAll"。

span.span: The default value is "DeleteAll".

summary.span: 如果屬性設定為 "DeleteNothing"，持續性提供者會在工作流程執行個體完成後，保留持續性資料庫中所有的執行個體資料和中繼資料。

span.span: If the property is set to "DeleteNothing", the persistence provider keeps all the instance data and metadata in the persistence database after the workflow instance completes.

summary.span: 如果屬性設定為 "DeleteAll"，持續性提供者會在工作流程執行個體完成後，刪除所有的執行個體資料和中繼資料。

span.span: If the property is set to "DeleteAll", the persistence provider deletes all the instance data and metadata after the workflow instance completes.

value.span: 工作流程執行個體完成後要執行的動作。

span.span: The action to be taken after a workflow completes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的值為 "DeleteNothing" 和 "DeleteAll"。Possible values are "DeleteNothing" and "DeleteAll". 預設值為 "DeleteAll"。The default value is "DeleteAll". 如果屬性設定為 "DeleteNothing"，持續性提供者會在工作流程執行個體完成後，保留持續性資料庫中所有的執行個體資料和中繼資料。If the property is set to "DeleteNothing", the persistence provider keeps all the instance data and metadata in the persistence database after the workflow instance completes. 如果屬性設定為 "DeleteAll"，持續性提供者會在工作流程執行個體完成後，刪除所有的執行個體資料和中繼資料。If the property is set to "DeleteAll", the persistence provider deletes all the instance data and metadata after the workflow instance completes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 InstanceCompletionAction。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceCompletionAction in a . 這個範例取自[內建組態](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md)範例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceEncodingOption InstanceEncodingOption { System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceEncodingOption get(); void set(System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceEncodingOption value); };

summary.span: 指定值，這個值會指出是否必須壓縮執行個體資料。

span.span: Specifies a value that indicates whether the instance data must be compressed.
The possible values are "None" and "GZip".
The default is "None".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值設定為"GZip"，使用 GZip 演算法壓縮執行個體資料。If the value is set to "GZip", the instance data is compressed using the GZip algorithm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 InstanceEncodingOption。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceEncodingOption in a . 這個範例取自[內建組態](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md)範例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceLockedExceptionAction InstanceLockedExceptionAction { System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceLockedExceptionAction get(); void set(System::Activities::DurableInstancing::InstanceLockedExceptionAction value); };

summary.span: 指定持續性提供者攔截 時要執行的動作。

span.span: Specifies the action to be taken when the persistence provider catches an .

value.span: 持續性提供者攔截 時要執行的動作。

span.span: The action to be taken when the persistence provider catches an

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定當工作流程服務執行個體發生 時，服務主機應執行的動作。Specify what action a service host should take when a workflow service instance experiences an . 當服務主機嘗試鎖定已由其他擁有人鎖定的執行個體時，服務主機會收到 。The service host receives an when it tries to lock an instance that is already locked by another owner. 以下清單列出可能的值：The possible values are in the following list: - **無**。**None**. 服務主機不會嘗試鎖定執行個體，以及傳遞 至呼叫端。The service host does not attempt to lock the instance and passes the to the caller. - **BasicRetry**。**BasicRetry**. 服務主機以線性重試間隔，重新嘗試鎖定執行個體，並將例外狀況傳遞至位於順序結尾的呼叫端。The service host reattempts to lock the instance with a linear retry interval and passes the exception to the caller at the end of the sequence. - **AggressiveRetry**。**AggressiveRetry**. 服務主機以指數遞增延遲，重新嘗試鎖定執行個體，並將 傳遞至位於順序結尾的呼叫端。The service host reattempts to lock the instance with an exponentially increasing delay and passes the to the caller at the end of the sequence. 一開始的間隔會很短暫，以期盡快取得鎖定，隨著每次嘗試失敗，間隔會越來越大。The intervals are short in the beginning in an attempt to acquire the lock as quickly as possible and the intervals gets bigger with every unsuccessful attempt. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 InstanceLockedExceptionAction。The following code sample demonstrates using InstanceLockedExceptionAction in a . 這個範例取自[內建組態](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md)範例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]

summary.span: 將指定的屬性與工作流程執行個體產生關聯，才能根據這些屬性的特定值，查詢執行個體。

span.span: Associates the specified properties with a workflow instance so that you can query for instances based on specific values for these properties.

summary.span: 這些可以用在外部查詢的屬性可以屬於簡單型別 (例如：Int64、String 等等)，或是屬於序列化的二進位型別 (byte[])。

span.span: These properties that can be used in external queries can be of simple types (for example: Int64, String, and so on) or of a serialized binary type (byte[]).

summary.span: 二進位屬性通常會用來儲存追蹤資料。

span.span: Binary properties are typically used to store tracking data.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 Promote。The following code sample demonstrates using Promote in a . 這個範例取自[SQLStoreExtensibility](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sqlstoreextensibility.md)範例。This example is from the [SQLStoreExtensibility](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/sqlstoreextensibility.md) sample. MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 指定時間週期，在此時間週期之後，SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區會在上一個偵測循環之後執行偵測工作，偵測持續性資料庫中任何可執行的或可啟動的工作流程執行個體。

span.span: Specifies the time period after which the SQL Workflow Instance Store runs a detection task to detect any runnable or activatable workflow instances in the persistence database after the previous detection cycle.
Returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會執行內部工作，定期喚醒和檢查持續性資料庫中是否有任何可執行的執行個體。The runs an internal task that periodically wakes up and checks if any runnable instances exist in the persistence database. 執行個體是*runnable*，如果它不是暫停的狀態或已完成的狀態，並且滿足以下條件：An instance is *runnable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions: - 執行個體已解除鎖定，並具有已過期的暫止計時器。The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired. - 執行個體已解除鎖定，其狀態為**執行**。The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**. - 執行個體上有過期的鎖定。The instance has an expired lock on it. 當 SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區在資料庫中找到可執行的執行個體，同時找到可載入在電腦上執行之執行個體的工作流程主機時，會引發 。The SQL Workflow Instance Store raises the when it finds a runnable instance in the database and also finds a workflow host capable of loading the instance running on the computer. 當工作流程主機收到這個事件時，會針對執行個體存放區執行 ，將執行個體載入至記憶體。When a workflow host receives this event, it executes the against the instance store to load the instance into the memory. 屬性的型別是 TimeSpan，值為"hh: mm:"的表單。The type of the property is TimeSpan and the value is of the form "hh:mm:ss". 最小值是"00: 00:01"（1 秒）。The minimum value is "00:00:01" (1 sec). 如果省略，預設值為"00: 00:05"（5 秒）。If omitted, defaults to "00:00:05" (5 secs). 這個參數是選擇性參數。This parameter is an optional parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 中使用 RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod。The following code sample demonstrates using RunnableInstancesDetectionPeriod in a . 這個範例取自[內建組態](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md)範例。This example is from the [Built-in Configuration](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/built-in-configuration.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_BuiltInConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_builtinconfiguration/cs/program.cs#1)]
